wwstatviz.io package¶

Submodules¶

wwstatviz.io.csvreader module¶

This module implements a CSV reader class to read CSV data file.

wwstatviz.io.iso module¶

ISO 2-digit and 3-digit country codes for data file validations.

wwstatviz.io.reader module¶

This module contains the base reader class from which any data file reader subclass should inherit.

wwstatviz.io.writer module¶

This module contains the base writer class from which any data file writer subclass should inherit.
